title: How to Make Simple Dill Pickles

steps.headline: Slice the cucumbers lengthwise into thin strips.
Place them into a large lidded jar.
Add the dill seed minced garlic.
In a saucepan, boil the vinegar, water, and salt for a minute or two.
Pour this mix over the cucumbers until the jar is full.
Place in the fridge without a lid and leave for a few hours.
Screw the lid on and leave for a few days.

text: Slice the cucumbers lengthwise into thin strips.  Place them into a large lidded jar. Mason jars work great. Add the dill seed minced garlic.  In a saucepan, boil the vinegar, water, and salt for a minute or two.  Pour this mix over the cucumbers until the jar is full.  Place in the fridge without a lid and leave for a few hours.  Screw the lid on and leave for a few days.  Serve and enjoy.  Finished.
